What are the treatments for X-linked adrenal hypoplasia congenita ?,"These resources address the diagnosis or management of X-linked adrenal hypoplasia congenita:  - Gene Review: Gene Review: X-Linked Adrenal Hypoplasia Congenita  - Genetic Testing Registry: Congenital adrenal hypoplasia, X-linked  - MedlinePlus Encyclopedia: Adrenal Glands  - MedlinePlus Encyclopedia: Hypogonadotropic Hypogo
